item.description:
Hi all!!

So it's been a while since I've had a chance to plan a meet-up but I am going to jump back in a game!
The Indepenent had a really great brunch and a wonderful atmosphere!! It is located right in Union Sq (plenty of parking on Sunday's, easy bus connection from David Sq & Harvard Sq.)
Hope to see you all there!!

To get a good look at the menu and a little more about the restaurant: http://www.theindo.co...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a reservation under my name.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch at the Independent
